ActPublic Service Staff Relations Act
PrecisApproval for the NATIONAL RESEARCH COUNCIL OF CANADA to enter into COLLECTIVE AGREEMENTS with THE PROFESSIONAL INSTITUTE OF THE PUBLIC SERVICE OF CANADA covering all employees in the INFORMATION SERVICES (IS) GROUP and the TRANSLATOR (TR) GROUP, for a two-year period expiring on June 20, 2004.
